addFavorite.title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
addFavorite.tagline: Every generation has a legend. Every journey has a first step. Every saga has a beginning.
addFavorite.overview: Anakin Skywalker, a young slave strong with the Force, is discovered on Tatooine. Meanwhile, the evil Sith have returned, enacting their plot for revenge against the Jedi.

addFavorite.title: The Incredible Hulk
addFavorite.tagline: You'll like him when he's angry.
addFavorite.overview: Scientist Bruce Banner scours the planet for an antidote to the unbridled force of rage within him: the Hulk. But when the military masterminds who dream of exploiting his powers force him back to civilization, he finds himself coming face to face with a new, deadly foe.

addFavorite.title: The Imitation Game
addFavorite.tagline: The true enigma was the man who cracked the code.
addFavorite.overview: Based on the real life story of legendary cryptanalyst Alan Turing, the film portrays the nail-biting race against time by Turing and his brilliant team of code-breakers at Britain's top-secret Government Code and Cypher School at Bletchley Park, during the darkest days of World War II.
